subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Kayaks
lead_paragraph: The kayaker Carrie Johnson clinched a spot in this summer’s Beijing Games by winning a 500-meter qualifying race at the United States Olympic Trials in Oklahoma City. Johnson led throughout the race, beating Maggie Hogan by more than two boat lengths. Johnson, who made her Olympic debut four years ago in Athens, finished in 2 minutes 13.978 seconds.
